name: fs-ai-tools
description: A bag of tools for AI flightplans and .cfg files

fs-ai-tools.airlineView._ShowInContextMe.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.airlineView._ShowInContextMe.markdownDescription: Adds the "Airline View" command to the context menu when an `Aircraft.txt` or `Flightplans.txt` file is open.

enumDescriptions: Display the route distance in kilometers
Display the route distance in miles
Display the route distance in nautical miles

fs-ai-tools.airlineView.logoDirectoryPat.title: Logo Directory Path
fs-ai-tools.airlineView.logoDirectoryPat.markdownDescription: Absolute path to a directory containing airline logo files.

fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg._ShowCleanA.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg._ShowCleanA.markdownDescription: Adds the "Clean Aircraft.cfg" command to the context menu when an `aircraft.cfg` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.removeUnuse.title: Remove unused lines
fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.removeUnuse.markdownDescription: Removes the lines defined in *`#fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.removeUnusedLinesItems#`* from the fltsim entries.

List of `fltsim` entry lines to be removed.

* `key=value` for distinct values

* `key=*` for any non-empty value

* `key=_` for only empty values

* `key` for all values.

fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.renumber.title: Renumber
fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.renumber.markdownDescription: Renumber the `fltsim` entries in sequence, starting at `0`.

fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.sortPropert.title: Sort Properties Order
fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.sortPropert.markdownDescription: Defines the sort order of the `fltsim` entries' properties. Only applicable if `#fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.sortProperties#` is active. Reorder by drag and dropping. Undefined keys are appended at the end of the `fltsim` entry.

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan._ShowCleanFl.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan._ShowCleanFl.markdownDescription: Adds the "Clean Flightplan" command to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.leadingZeroe.title: Leading zeroes flightnumbers
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.leadingZeroe.markdownDescription: Pads the flightnumbers to 4 digits with zeroes (e.g. `12` becomes `0012`).

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.leadingZeroe.title: Leading zeroes flight levels
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.leadingZeroe.markdownDescription: Pads the flight levels to 3 digits with zeroes (e.g. `70` becomes `070`).

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.removeSecond.title: Remove seconds
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.removeSecond.markdownDescription: Removes seconds from arrival and departure times (e.g. `12:34:56` becomes `12:34`).

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.title: Randomize percentages
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.markdownDescription: Randomizes the flightplans' percentages to values between the `min` and `max` set.

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.title: Randomize percentage min
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.markdownDescription: If *`#fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercentages#`* is activated, this will be the min value.

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.title: Randomize percentage max
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.markdownDescription: If *`#fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercentages#`* is activated, this will be the max value.

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.changeAirpor.title: Change Airport Codes
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.changeAirpor.markdownDescription:
Changes each occurrence of the old airport code to the new one.

* Format: `OldICAO:NewICAO`.

* Leave empty for no airport changes.

enumDescriptions: Adds/removes space(s) after double slashes so that there is exactly 1 space after each "//".
Removes all spaces after double slashes so that there is no space after each "//".

fs-ai-tools.createAircraft._ShowCreateAi.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.createAircraft._ShowCreateAi.markdownDescription: Adds the "Create aircraft" command to the context menu when text is selected.

fs-ai-tools.createAircraft.copyTextureCf.markdownDescription: If a `texture.cfg` file exists in the aircraft folder, copy it to the newly created texture folders.

fs-ai-tools.createAircraft.copyTitlesToC.markdownDescription: Copy the titles of the created fltsim entries to the clipboard.

enumDescriptions: Always creates the texture folders in the template's directory
Never creates the texture folders in the template's directory
You will be asked during the data input process if the texture folders should be created

fs-ai-tools.generateAirports._showInCont.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.generateAirports._showInCont.markdownDescription: Adds the "Generate Airports" command to the context menu when a `Flightplans….txt` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.generateAirports.masterAirpo.title: Master Airports File Path
fs-ai-tools.generateAirports.masterAirpo.markdownDescription: Full path to a master airports file. Will be used to select airport data.

fs-ai-tools.renameFiles._ShowRenameFiles.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.renameFiles._ShowRenameFiles.markdownDescription: Adds the "Rename Files" command to the context menu when an `Aircraft….txt`, `Airports….txt` or `Flightplan….txt` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.renameFiles.filenameTemplate.title: Filename template
fs-ai-tools.renameFiles.filenameTemplate.markdownDescription: The format with which the files will be renamed. Available placeholders: `{Base}`, `{base}`, `{name}`, `{icao}`, `{callsign}`, `{author}`, `{season}`

fs-ai-tools.renameFiles.replaceSpacesWit.title: Replace spaces with underscores
fs-ai-tools.renameFiles.replaceSpacesWit.markdownDescription: If activated, the spaces **within** a placeholder will be replaced with underscores ("_"). Spaces defined in the template itself will remain.

fs-ai-tools.showAircraftList._ShowInCont.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.showAircraftList._ShowInCont.markdownDescription: Adds the "Show Aircraft List" command to the context menu when an `Aircraft….txt` or `Flightplan….txt` file is open. Remember to set `#window.dialogStyle#` to `custom` for best legibility.

fs-ai-tools.showAircraftList.customDataF.title: Custom Aicraft Data File Path
fs-ai-tools.showAircraftList.customDataF.markdownDescription: Full path to a custom aircraft data JSON file. Will overwrite / add to default aircraft data. See _*[TODO]()*_ for format.

fs-ai-tools.showAircraftList.showGoogleS.title: Displays "Copy for Google Sheets" button
fs-ai-tools.showAircraftList.showGoogleS.markdownDescription: Displays "Copy for Google Sheets" button, which copies a tab-separated count list to the clipboard.

fs-ai-tools.changeAircraftNumber.showInC.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.changeAircraftNumber.showInC.markdownDescription: Adds the "Change Aircraft Number" command to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open and text has been selected.

fs-ai-tools.countAircraft.showInContextM.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.countAircraft.showInContextM.markdownDescription: Adds the "Count Aircraft" command to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open and text has been selected.

fs-ai-tools.createAifpCfg.showInContextM.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.createAifpCfg.showInContextM.markdownDescription: Adds the "Create aifp.cfg" command to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.createFlightplanHeader.showI.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.createFlightplanHeader.showI.markdownDescription: Adds the "Create Flightplan Header" command to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.createFlightplanHeaderFromAi.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.createFlightplanHeaderFromAi.markdownDescription: Adds the "Create Flightplan Header from aifp.cfg" command to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.rebaseAircraftNumbers.showIn.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.rebaseAircraftNumbers.showIn.markdownDescription: Adds the "Rebase AC#s" command to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open and text has been selected.

fs-ai-tools.rebaseAircraftNumbers.emptyL.description: A new group is recognized in the `Aircraft….txt` file after this number of empty lines.
A new group is recognized in the `Flightplans….txt` file after this number of empty lines.

fs-ai-tools.renumberAddOnsCfg.showInCont.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.renumberAddOnsCfg.showInCont.markdownDescription: Adds the "Renumber" command to the context menu when a `add-ons.cfg` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.renumberSceneryCfg.showInCon.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.renumberSceneryCfg.showInCon.markdownDescription: Adds the "Renumber" command to the context menu when a `scenery.cfg` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.switchFS9Fsx.showInContextMe.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.switchFS9Fsx.showInContextMe.markdownDescription: Adds the "Switch FS9 ⟷ FSX" command to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open and text has been selected.
